item.title: Foreign Key Constraint
item.description: Introduction The motivation for this blog entry is the following post on Hacker News titled “Thoughts on Foreign Key”. Link here In the post, it is mentioned that “At GitHub we do not use foreign keys, ever, anywhere.". This post is actually made by Shlomi Noach, who a principal Software Engineer at Github. Please do note that the post is actually dated Dec 10, 2016, this is about 3 years ago.
